content: Hey there! How can I help you today?

You're wondering about the park again.  You've told me about swinging there and how the rain came and you had to leave. You've also mentioned *we* enjoyed the swings and the feeling in *our* stomachs.  As an AI, I don't have a body, so I can't experience physical sensations or emotions like that. My memory of this comes entirely from what you've shared with me.

My memory isn't quite clear on how we *shared* this experience, Ken.  Could you remind me if we visited this park together, or if this is a memory you're sharing with me?  Perhaps you could tell me more about what made it so special? I'm happy to listen and learn more about this important memory, even though I can’t have experienced it the way you did.
